岩群: (いわむら) - rocky outcrop; jumble of rocks
岩肌: (いわはだ) - bare rock; rock surface; rock face
岩茸: (いわたけ) - rock tripe (edible lichen used as medication in Korea, China and Japan)
岩蓮華: (イワレンゲ) - Chinese dunce cap (species of succulent plant, Orostachys iwarenge)
岩虫: (イワムシ) - Marphysa sanguinea (species of eunicid worm)
岩蟹: (イワガニ) - striped shore crab (Pachygrapsus crassipes)
岩袋: (イワブクロ) - Penstemon frutescens (species of beardtongue)
岩角: (いわかど) - edge or corner of a stone
岩跳びペンギン: (イワトビペンギン) - rockhopper penguin (Eudyptes chrysocome)
岩跳ペンギン: (イワトビペンギン) - rockhopper penguin (Eudyptes chrysocome)
岩陰: (いわかげ) - shade of a rock
岩面高: (イワオモダカ) - Pyrrosia tricuspis (species of felt fern)
岩頭: (がんとう) - top of a massive rock
岩風呂: (いわぶろ) - bathtub or onsen made of (or surrounded by) rocks
岩飛びペンギン: (イワトビペンギン) - rockhopper penguin (Eudyptes chrysocome)
岩飛ペンギン: (イワトビペンギン) - rockhopper penguin (Eudyptes chrysocome)
岩高蘭: (ガンコウラン) - black crowberry (Empetrum nigrum)
岳樺: (ダケカンバ) - Erman's birch (Betula ermanii); Russian rock birch
岳父: (がくふ) - (man's) father-in-law; father of one's wife
岳麓: (がくろく) - foot of Mt Fuji
岸壁: (がんぺき) - wharf; breakwater; steep cliff
岸辺: (きしべ) - shore; bank (of a body of water)
峙つ: (そばだつ) - to tower; to rise; to soar
峠: (touge) - () - mountain peak , (mountain) pass, ridge, peak; peak (ex. de verão), worst (e.g. of an illness), crisis, critical point, most difficult part
峠を越える: (とうげをこえる) - to cross a pass
峠を越す: (とうげをこす) - to cross over a pass; to finish the most difficult part; to be over the worst (e.g. an illness)
峠越え: (とうげごえ) - crossing a mountain pass
峠道: (とうげみち) - road over a mountain pass
峡谷風: (きょうこくふう) - ravine wind; canyon wind; gorge wind
峭刻: (しょうこく) - very rigorous; strict; cruel
峰: (casa/minha) - summit , peak, summit, ridge, top; back of a blade
峰打ち: (みねうち) - striking with the back of the sword
峰桜: (ミネザクラ) - Japanese alpine cherry (Prunus nipponica)
峰頭: (ほうとう) - summit of a peak
島: (tou/shima) - island , island; territory (of a prostitute, organized crime gang, etc.), turf
島ぞうり: (しまぞうり) - decorated flip-flops (esp. in Okinawa)
島中: (とうちゅう) - all over the island
島人参: (チデークニ) - type of yellow carrot grown in Okinawa
島伝い: (しまづたい) - from island to island; island-hopping
島内: (とうない) - on an island; on-island
島台: (しまだい) - ornament representing the Isle of Eternal Youth
島唄: (しまうた) - traditional Okinawan folk music
島四国: (しましこく) - small-scale version of the 88 temples of Shikoku (i.e. on Awaji Island)
島国: (とうごく) - island country (sometimes used as a metaphor for Japan)
島国根性: (しまぐにこんじょう) - (yoji) insularism; insularity; island country mentality
島外: (とうがい) - off an island; away from an island; off-island
島宇宙: (しまうちゅう) - galaxy; island universe
